title: The Public Exposure Edition
description:
On this episode of Slate Money, host Felix Salmon of Fusion, Cathy O’Neil of mathbabe.org, and Slate’s Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann discuss infidelity.
Topics discussed on today’s show include:

The eventuality of the Ashley Madison hack.
Is the CFPB really putting an end to Citibank's greatest cheats?
Why Nikkei paid so much for the Financial Times.
